value.title: PiG's StarCraft 2 Build Orders & Guides
value.excerpt: Here are my StarCraft 2 build orders & guides. Hopefully they help you with your gameplay and build orders. Let me know what guides you want to see!

topItems.title: How does REYNOR get ahead EVERY SINGLE ZvT?

value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Protoss vs Protoss guide/tutorial. Today we're learning an aggressive pvp opening with 8 adepts + 2 oracles.
